name: Worm's Passage
description:
The game takes place under an abandoned jelly factory after a nuclear accident in the region that left some giant insects.

Credits:

  • Free Sounds from: https://freesound.org/ 
  • Developer/Programmer: Flafy
  • Game Designer: Pedro Carneiro
  • UI Designer / Artist: Gabriel Bianchi
  • Artist: Vitor Lopes

Keys:

  • move: arrows
  • reset level: R
  • buttons: mouse left click

To get back to the main menu from a level press on the arrow in the bottom left corner of the window(the arrow will fade away if the mouse is not close to it).

The game have an auto save system.

Enjoy!
